Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works Published in New Zealand 
    Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) --A collection of leader  Kim Jong Il's famous works "On Having a Correct View and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" and "Socialism Is Life-blood of Our People" was brought out by the New Zealand-DPRK Society on October 3.

Phyongwon Middle School Renamed Hero School 
    Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) - Phyongwon Middle School in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, has been renamed Hero Phyongwon Middle School.
 Emerging from among the graduates of the school were 13 heroes who rendered distinguished services at posts of national defense and in different fields of the national economy. They consist of one Twice Hero, seven Heroes of the Republic and five Labour Heroes.    
 The renaming ceremony took pace at the school on October 2
